about.title: Happy Mall - the largest mall in Moldova
about.text: The shopping center was built in accordance with the highest international quality standards. Here you will find a Fashion Gallery with more than 250 brands, an area with Home, lifestyle & beauty products with all services included - supermarket, hyperpharmacy, pet store, dry cleaner, bank, beauty salon.
